attributes.action: taxing  armed forces pensions as second incomes,it has to stop
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: whilst many retired armed force personnel retire at 40, they can draw an armed forces pension straight away, unfortunately the pension is not enough to live on, if you were a NON COMMISIONED RANK, so many get work, but then the pension is then taxed as a second income, being taxed twice!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
